name: Play it again Sam 6
overview: A compilation of 4 games: Galaforce 2 (aka Galaforce 2: Aliens' Revenge) a space shooter for 1 or 2 players. It was written by Kevin Edwards and Martin Galway and was first published in this compilation and subsequently released as a standalone in the same year by Superior/Blue Ribbon. Hopper a single player Frogger clone. It was written by Neil Raine and was originally released in 1983 by Acornsoft. Hunchback a single player scrolling platformer. It was written by John Dyson and was originally released in 1983 by Ocean and Superior. The Sentinel a single player strategy game. It was written by Geoff Crammond and was originally released in 1986 by Firebird.
